name: peerpressure
description: This is a template repository for CS3219 project.

scripts.collab: cd ../collaboration-service && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.comm: cd ../communication-service && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.match: cd ../matching-service && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.user: cd ../user-service && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run collab" "npm run front" "npm run match" "npm run user" "npm run comm"
